opt_out_description: Consumer may opt out of processing of personal data for purposes of targeted advertising; precision marketing; behavioral advertising; profiling for advertising purposes
response_timeframe: Immediate if via UOOM; 45 days if direct request

opt_out_type: Opt Out of Sale of Personal Data
opt_out_description: Consumer may opt out of sale of personal data for monetary or other valuable consideration; includes direct sales and disclosure for valuable consideration; sharing data for compensation
response_timeframe: Immediate if via UOOM; 45 days if direct request

opt_out_type: Opt Out of Profiling with Legal Effects
opt_out_description: Consumer may opt out of profiling in furtherance of decisions that produce legal or similarly significant effects concerning the consumer; automated decision-making; credit decisions; employment decisions
response_timeframe: Immediate if via UOOM; 45 days if direct request
